php.LBL_RC_smtp_user: Prijava v strežnik SMTP ("%u"- prijava prijavljenega uporabnika)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_pass: Geslo za strežnik SMTP ("%p"-geslo prijavljenega uporabnika)
php.LBL_RC_smtp_host: SMTP host (ssl://smtp.gmail.com:465, SMTP port default 25; 465 for SSL; 587)
php.LBL_RC_debug_level: Raven odpravljanja napak (1 = log; 4 = kažejo, 8 = sledi)
php.LBL_RC_ip_check: Preverite naslov IP odjemalca med odobritvijo
php.LBL_RC_auto_create_user: Ob prijavi samodejno ustvari novega uporabnika
php.LBL_RC_mdn_requests: Kako ravnati, če sporočilo zahteva obvestilo o dostavi
php.LBL_RC_imap_open_add_connection_type: Dodajte vrsto in protokol k naslovu
php.identities_level_0: veliko identitet z možnostjo urejanja vseh parametrov
php.identities_level_1: veliko identitet z možnostjo urejanja vseh parametrov samo ne e-naslova pošte
php.identities_level_2: ena identiteta z možnostjo urejanja vseh parametrov
php.identities_level_3: ena identiteta z možnostjo urejanja vseh parametrov samo ne e-naslova pošte
php.identities_level_4: ena identiteta z možnostjo urejanja samo podpisov
php.htmleditor_3: pri prenosu ali odgovarjanju na HTML sporočilo
php.mdn_requests_3: pošlji samodejno, če je pošiljatelj v imeniku, drugače vprašajte uporabnika
php.mdn_requests_4: pošlji samodejno, če je pošiljatelj v imeniku, drugače enostavno prezrite
php.LBL_MAIL_NOT_FOUND_IN_DB: Pošte ni bilo mogoče najti v zbirki podatkov.
php.LBL_FILE_HAS_BEEN_IMPORTED: Podatki so bili uvoženi. Število uvoženih zapisov: %s
php.LBL_BLACK_LIST_DESC: Add the address to blacklist, an e-mail will be marked as spam and moved to the spam folder.
php.LBL_WHITE_LIST_DESC: Add the address to whitelist, an e-mail will be marked as trusted.
php.LBL_ALERT_NEUTRAL_LIST: Unknown e-mail sender, if the sender is trusted, add it the whitelist and if it is SPAM, add to the blacklist.
php.LBL_BLACK_LIST_ALERT: Nevaren naslov pošiljatelja. Naslov IP je bil uvrščen na črno listo zaradi neželene pošte / ponarejanja / lažnega predstavljanja.
php.LBL_WHITE_LIST_ALERT: Zaupanja vreden strežnik pošiljatelja. IP je na belem seznamu strežnika.
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_MAIL:
Watch out for this message, it is not possible to verify if the message was in fact sent from the sender's address.
Do not click any links, download attachments, or provide personal information in response.
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_SENDER:
Watch out for this message, the email address in the From field has been forged.
Do not click any links, download attachments, or provide personal information in response.
php.LBL_NO_IP_ADDRESS: The sender's IP address was not found
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_LOCAL: Report sent to a local RBL base
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_PUBLIC: Report sent to a public RBL base
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_IP_WHITE: Sender's server is whitelisted, created a verification request for the administrator
php.LBL_RC_ADDED_RBL_REPORT_IP_BLACK: Sender's server is blacklisted, created a verification request for the administrator
php.LBL_RC_ERROR_RBL_REPORT: There was an error while sending a report to RBL
